name: apply
javadoc:
/**
 * Applies a regular expression pattern to the provided text and returns an array of matched tokens.
 *
 * @param text the input text to be processed
 * @return an array of matched tokens, or an empty array if no matches were found
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Applies a regular expression pattern to the provided text and returns an array of matched tokens.
 *
 * @param text the input text to be processed, which must not be null or blank
 * @return an array of matched tokens, or an empty array if no matches were found
 */
